Player History
Earned first career win on 4/3/1985...
Had first career hit on 4/16/1985, off Dennis Martinez (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1985, winning 2 games with a 1.15 ERA...
Injured on 6/15/1987 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,190,000 through salary arbitration...
8/25/1988: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $3,450,000 per year, for 3 years.
9/1/1988: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $3,450,000 per year, for 3 years.
